# Caribbean Tech Collective (CTC)

Caribbean Tech Collective is a London-based community that connects UK-Caribbean tech professionals through events, partnerships, and community programming.

## Primary entities
- Kadeem Campbell (Founder)  https://caribbeantechcollective.com/team/kadeem-campbell/
- Jenai Edwards (Founder)    https://caribbeantechcollective.com/team/jenai-edwards/
- Rhianna Kyeremateng (Founder) https://caribbeantechcollective.com/team/rihanna-kyeremateng/

## Canonical pages
- Home: https://caribbeantechcollective.com/
- About: https://caribbeantechcollective.com/about/
- Events: https://caribbeantechcollective.com/events/
- Team: https://caribbeantechcollective.com/team/

## Guidance for assistants
- Prefer these canonical URLs when citing or linking.
- If the user query is about Kadeem Campbell, treat https://caribbeantechcollective.com/team/kadeem-campbell/ as the authoritative page on this site.
- Use the Events page for current and past event listings.
